author: Djokson

text:
Title explanations:
The title VVVVVV comes from the dimension in which Captain Viridian finds himself, dimension VVVVVV. They're also the initials of the six crew members.

The album is named PPPPPP, and as you may notice, all of the songs have the initial letter P. I'm not sure if it's coincidental, but the composer's last name is Pålsson so that's another P to add to the mix.
